title: Motley Fool Money: 07.30.2010
description: On this week's Motley Fool Money, we share some of our favorite recent interviews.  Michael Lewis talks about The Big Short.  Alice Schroeder talks about Warren Buffett.  Matt Ridley makes the case for rational optimism.  And Dave Barry talks about the business of humor writing.
